action.help: Action taken with traffic in which signatures are detected.
action.name: action

options.help: Pass or drop matching traffic, depending on the default action of the signature.
options.name: default

application.help: Applications to be protected. set application ? lists available applications. all includes all applications. other includes all unlisted applications.
application.name: application

cve.help: List of CVE IDs of the signatures to add to the sensor
cve.name: cve

exempt-ip.help: Traffic from selected source or destination IP addresses is exempt from this signature.
exempt-ip.name: exempt-ip

log.help: Enable/disable logging of signatures included in filter.
log.name: log

log-attack-context.help: Enable/disable logging of attack context: URL buffer, header buffer, body buffer, packet buffer.
log-attack-context.name: log-attack-context

options.help: Disable logging of detailed attack context.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable logging of detailed attack context.
options.name: enable

log-packet.help: Enable/disable packet logging. Enable to save the packet that triggers the filter. You can download the packets in pcap format for diagnostic use.
log-packet.name: log-packet

options.help: Disable packet logging of selected rules.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable packet logging of selected rules.
options.name: enable

os.help: Operating systems to be protected.  all includes all operating systems. other includes all unlisted operating systems.
os.name: os

protocol.help: Protocols to be examined. set protocol ? lists available protocols. all includes all protocols. other includes all unlisted protocols.
protocol.name: protocol

options.help: Block all traffic sent from attacker's IP address. The attacker's IP address is also added to the banned user list. The target's address is not affected.
options.name: attacker

quarantine-expiry.help: Duration of quarantine. (Format ###d##h##m, minimum 1m, maximum 364d23h59m, default = 5m). Requires quarantine set to attacker.
quarantine-expiry.name: quarantine-expiry

options.help: Allow configured number of packets every rate-duration.
options.name: periodical

options.help: Block packets once the rate is reached.
options.name: continuous

rule.help: Identifies the predefined or custom IPS signatures to add to the sensor.
rule.name: rule

severity.help: Relative severity of the signature, from info to critical. Log messages generated by the signature include the severity.
severity.name: severity

status.help: Status of the signatures included in filter. default enables the filter and only use filters with default status of enable. Filters with default status of disable will not be used.
status.name: status

scan-botnet-connections.help: Block or monitor connections to Botnet servers, or disable Botnet scanning.
scan-botnet-connections.name: scan-botnet-connections

options.help: Do not scan connections to botnet servers.
options.name: disable
